Text:
Can you atleast encode instead of uploading the whole bluray disk.

126 mins should be 4-5gb with high quality video n audio.

When you play the bluray, the actual video flickers.  The film otherwise is watchable butt apart from this flickering and breaking up in picture every few seconds.  Does anyone else experience this when playing it through WinDVD Pro or Cyberlink PowerDVD 11?  

Also if you burn this to bluray disc, has anyone noticed any faults in the picture quality?  Is there any work around to fix the bluray?
